QuestData.Title: Pterrortorial Dispute
QuestData.Description: De courtyard of Zanchul has been overrun by pterrordaxes driven mad by some dark ritual. Power is coalescing here, and it is hard to tell who or what is causing it.$b$bI need to track down de source. In de meantime, you take dis, de power of Gonk, and call his allies to help you in battle. Slay dese maddened pterrordaxes.$b$bWhen you are done, tell Raal to get his flock under control.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Hexlord Raal in Zanchul.
